data.prayer: the state of `Adan has (about) 153 people who know Jesus, 1,298 people who know about him culturally, and 729,549 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of ‘Adan, Yemen
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 729,549 lost people in  ‘Adan, Yemen have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 153 believers in ‘Adan, Yemen how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in ‘Adan, Yemen.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Arab, Egyptian people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Arab, Egyptian people know you.
Jesus, 731,000 people live in the state of `Adan. Please, give them 146 new simple churches this year.
Father, may the churches in ‘Adan, Yemen honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of ‘Adan, Yemen. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

location.name: `Adan
